name: linked (itch) (Glitch3d)
description:
This is a game built for the GMTK game jam with the theme "Joined Together".  

In this game two players control one character, one controlling the Y-axis with the W and S keys, while the other player controls the X-axis with the left and right arrow keys, so you'll need to communicate if you want to reach the end! 

(it's more fun with two players,  but if you want to you can play solo)

--extra information--

My friend PowerUnited#0001 made the bounce pads 

I made the sound effects but the background music (free to use) is this: The background music

and the pixel art is  from this asset (free to use) and from this asset too! (also free to use)
